item.name: Количество запусков
item.description: Отчет отображает статистику по запускаемым процессам --- Author: NodaSoft support@nodasoft.ru
item.sqlcode: Select P.[Name] As [Название], P.[result] as [Общее], ISNULL(P1.[result],0) as [General], ISNULL(P2.[result],0) as [VIP] from (select [name], COUNT(P.[id]) as [result] from Process AS P INNER JOIN Computers AS C ON C.[id] = idComputer where (not [StartTime] is null and not [StartTime] is null and ([StartTime] >= %TIME-START%) and ([StartTime]<=%TIME-STOP%)) and ([Name] <> 'userinit.exe') and ([Name] <> 'winlogon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'wuauclt.exe') and ([Name] <> 'services.exe') and ([Name] <> 'smss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'spoolsv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'svchost.exe') and ([Name] <> '[System Process]') and ([Name] <> 'alg.exe') and ([Name] <> 'csrss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'ctfmon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'explorer.exe') and ([Name] <> 'rshell.exe') and ([Name] <> 'logonui.exe') and ([Name] <> 'lsass.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gccl.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gcclsrv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'System') group by [name]) as P LEFT OUTER JOIN (select [name], COUNT(P.[id]) as [result] from Process AS P INNER JOIN Computers AS C ON C.[id] = idComputer where (not [StartTime] is null and not [StartTime] is null and ([StartTime] >= %TIME-START%) and ([StartTime]<=%TIME-STOP%)) and ([Name] <> 'userinit.exe') and ([Name] <> 'winlogon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'wuauclt.exe') and ([Name] <> 'services.exe') and ([Name] <> 'smss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'spoolsv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'svchost.exe') and ([Name] <> '[System Process]') and ([Name] <> 'alg.exe') and ([Name] <> 'csrss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'ctfmon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'explorer.exe') and ([Name] <> 'rshell.exe') and ([Name] <> 'logonui.exe') and ([Name] <> 'lsass.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gccl.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gcclsrv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'System') and (idGroup = 1) group by [name]) AS P1 ON P.name = P1.name LEFT OUTER JOIN (select [name], COUNT(P.[id]) as [result] from Process AS P INNER JOIN Computers AS C ON C.[id] = idComputer where (not [StartTime] is null and not [StartTime] is null and ([StartTime] >= %TIME-START%) and ([StartTime]<=%TIME-STOP%)) and ([Name] <> 'userinit.exe') and ([Name] <> 'winlogon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'wuauclt.exe') and ([Name] <> 'services.exe') and ([Name] <> 'smss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'spoolsv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'svchost.exe') and ([Name] <> '[System Process]') and ([Name] <> 'alg.exe') and ([Name] <> 'csrss.exe') and ([Name] <> 'ctfmon.exe') and ([Name] <> 'explorer.exe') and ([Name] <> 'rshell.exe') and ([Name] <> 'logonui.exe') and ([Name] <> 'lsass.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gccl.exe') and ([Name] <> 'gcclsrv.exe') and ([Name] <> 'System') and (idGroup = 2) group by [name]) AS P2 ON P.name = P2.name order by P.[result] desc
